artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Wacoal; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Multi colored 2.75" squares spaced 3.25" apart. Squares have either thin horiz. stripes or rows of small variously spaced vert. rectangles. Polka dot background. Pattern rpt. 36". Multi colored pastels on grey. Gypsy Moth
